CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Ferguson is a leading value-added distributor in North America providing expertise, solutions and products from infrastructure, plumbing and appliances to HVAC, fire, fabrication and more. We exist to make our customers complex projects simple, successful and sustainable.
